actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fishery Conservation and Management Act of 1976 in order to provide the Northern Marianas with representation on the Western Pacific Regional Fisheries Management Council.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends the Fishery Conservation and Management Act of 1976 to give the Northern Marianas representation on the Western Pacific Regional Fisheries Management Council. Increases the number of voting members on the Council.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fishery Conservation and Management Act of 1976 in order to provide the Northern Marianas with representation on the Western Pacific Regional Fisheries Management Council.
